findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables that initialize only in the constructor are not defined as immutable.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can occur for various reasons and increase the size of the contract and deployment cost.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables configured on user-supplied input are missing proper checks for zero values, leading to potential problems during contract execution.
